title: Statistical Mechanics
description: The statistical basis of thermodynamics is developed. Topics include entropy and the second law, partition functions and free energy, systems of variable particle number, and quantum statistics.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: PHYS 3141 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and PHYS 3143 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
